name: salesforce-memo
title: Salesforce Memo
description: Create, manage and sync memos with Salesforce. Store memos in JSON format and link them to Salesforce records.
author: dd.suzuki

commands.name: create-memo
commands.title: Create Memo
commands.subtitle: Salesforce Memo
commands.description: Create a new memo and optionally link it to a Salesforce record

commands.name: view-memos
commands.title: View Memos
commands.subtitle: Salesforce Memo
commands.description: View, edit and send memos to Salesforce

commands.name: settings
commands.title: Settings
commands.subtitle: Salesforce Memo
commands.description: Configure Salesforce connection and memo storage settings

preferences.name: salesforceObjectType
preferences.title: Salesforce Object Type
preferences.description: The Salesforce object type to use for storing memos

preferences.name: customObjectName
preferences.title: Custom Object Name
preferences.description: Name of custom Salesforce object (only if 'Custom Object' is selected above)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
